title: Nutrition/Weight
data:
Here is a list of [food](/wiki/Food "Food") organized by its **nutrition/weight ratio**. The idea is that, all other considerations being equal (such as other uses for food besides nutrition, etc.), it makes most sense to eat foods with a lower ratio first and hang on to food that gives a higher ratio to maximize weight efficiency.

*V indicates [vegetarian](/wiki/Conduct#Vegetarian "Conduct") food*  
*! indicates [vegan](/wiki/Conduct#Vegan "Conduct") food*

| [Food](/wiki/Food "Food")                                              | [Cost](/wiki/Gold "Gold") | [Weight](/wiki/Weight "Weight") | [Probability](/wiki/Random_number_generator "Random number generator") | [Nutrition](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition") | Nutrition/weight | [Turns to eat](/wiki/Time "Time") | [Conduct](/wiki/Conduct "Conduct") |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------- | ------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ---------------- | --------------------------------- | ---------------------------------- |
| [lembas wafer](/wiki/Lembas_wafer "Lembas wafer")                      | 45                        | 5                               | 20                                                                     | 800                                      | 160              | 2                                 | !                                  |
| [lump of royal jelly](/wiki/Lump_of_royal_jelly "Lump of royal jelly") | 15                        | 2                               | 0                                                                      | 200                                      | 100              | 1                                 | V                                  |
| [pancake](/wiki/Pancake "Pancake")                                     | 15                        | 2                               | 25                                                                     | 200                                      | 100              | 2                                 | V                                  |
| [egg](/wiki/Egg "Egg")                                                 | 9                         | 1                               | 85                                                                     | 80                                       | 80               | 1                                 | V                                  |
| blessed [tin of spinach](/wiki/Tin_of_spinach "Tin of spinach")        | 5                         | 10                              | 0.625                                                                  | 600                                      | 60               | 1-2                               | !                                  |
| [slime mold](/wiki/Slime_mold "Slime mold") (user defined fruit)       | 17                        | 5                               | 75                                                                     | 250                                      | 50               | 1                                 | !                                  |
| [candy bar](/wiki/Candy_bar "Candy bar")                               | 10                        | 2                               | 13                                                                     | 100                                      | 50               | 1                                 | V                                  |
| uncursed [tin of spinach](/wiki/Tin_of_spinach "Tin of spinach")       | 5                         | 10                              | 11.25                                                                  | 401-600                                  | 40.1-60          | varies                            | !                                  |
| [food ration](/wiki/Food_ration "Food ration") (gunyoki)               | 45                        | 20                              | 380                                                                    | 800                                      | 40               | 5                                 | !                                  |
| [cram ration](/wiki/Cram_ration "Cram ration")                         | 35                        | 15                              | 20                                                                     | 600                                      | 40               | 3                                 | !                                  |
| [K-ration](/wiki/K-ration "K-ration")                                  | 25                        | 10                              | 0                                                                      | 400                                      | 40               | 1                                 | !                                  |
| [banana](/wiki/Banana "Banana")                                        | 9                         | 2                               | 10                                                                     | 80                                       | 40               | 1                                 | !                                  |
| [orange](/wiki/Orange "Orange")                                        | 9                         | 2                               | 10                                                                     | 80                                       | 40               | 1                                 | !                                  |
| [clove of garlic](/wiki/Clove_of_garlic "Clove of garlic")             | 7                         | 1                               | 7                                                                      | 40                                       | 40               | 1                                 | !                                  |
| [sprig of wolfsbane](/wiki/Sprig_of_wolfsbane "Sprig of wolfsbane")    | 7                         | 1                               | 7                                                                      | 40                                       | 40               | 1                                 | !                                  |
| [fortune cookie](/wiki/Fortune_cookie "Fortune cookie")                | 7                         | 1                               | 55                                                                     | 40                                       | 40               | 1                                 | V, breaks illiteracy unless blind  |
| [kelp frond](/wiki/Kelp_frond "Kelp frond")                            | 6                         | 1                               | 0                                                                      | 30                                       | 30               | 1                                 | !                                  |
| [eucalyptus leaf](/wiki/Eucalyptus_leaf "Eucalyptus leaf")             | 6                         | 1                               | 3                                                                      | 30                                       | 30               | 1                                 | !                                  |
| [C-ration](/wiki/C-ration "C-ration")                                  | 20                        | 10                              | 0                                                                      | 300                                      | 30               | 1                                 | !                                  |
| [apple](/wiki/Apple "Apple")                                           | 7                         | 2                               | 15                                                                     | 50                                       | 25               | 1                                 | !                                  |
| [carrot](/wiki/Carrot "Carrot")                                        | 7                         | 2                               | 15                                                                     | 50                                       | 25               | 1                                 | !                                  |
| [pear](/wiki/Pear "Pear")                                              | 7                         | 2                               | 10                                                                     | 50                                       | 25               | 1                                 | !                                  |
| [tripe ration](/wiki/Tripe_ration "Tripe ration")                      | 15                        | 10                              | 140                                                                    | 200                                      | 20               | 2                                 |                                    |
| [melon](/wiki/Melon "Melon")                                           | 10                        | 5                               | 10                                                                     | 100                                      | 20               | 1                                 | !                                  |
| cursed [tin of spinach](/wiki/Tin_of_spinach "Tin of spinach")         | 5                         | 10                              | 0.625                                                                  | 201-600                                  | 20.1-60          | varies                            | !                                  |
| [cream pie](/wiki/Cream_pie "Cream pie")                               | 10                        | 10                              | 25                                                                     | 100                                      | 10               | 1                                 | V                                  |
| [lichen](/wiki/Lichen "Lichen") [corpse](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse")        | 5                         | 20                              | n/a                                                                    | 200                                      | 10               | 3                                 | !                                  |
| [meatball](/wiki/Meatball "Meatball")                                  | 5                         | 1                               | 0                                                                      | 5                                        | 5                | 1                                 |                                    |
| [meat ring](/wiki/Meat_ring "Meat ring")                               | 5                         | 1                               | 0                                                                      | 5                                        | 5                | 1                                 |                                    |
| [meat stick](/wiki/Meat_stick "Meat stick")                            | 5                         | 1                               | 0                                                                      | 5                                        | 5                | 1                                 |                                    |
| [huge chunk of meat](/wiki/Huge_chunk_of_meat "Huge chunk of meat")    | 105                       | 400                             | 0                                                                      | 2000                                     | 5                | 20                                |                                    |
| [lizard](/wiki/Lizard "Lizard") corpse                                 | 5                         | 10                              | n/a                                                                    | 40                                       | 4                | 3                                 |                                    |
| other [corpses](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse")                                 | 5                         | varies                          | 0                                                                      | varies                                   | varies           | varies                            |                                    |
| [tin](/wiki/Tin "Tin")                                                 | 5                         | 10                              | 75                                                                     | varies                                   | varies           | varies                            |                                    |

## Racial bonuses and penalties

As of [NetHack 3.6.1](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.1 "NetHack 3.6.1"), the following bonuses and penalties exist:

- Lembas wafers provide 200 extra nutrition to [elves](/wiki/Elf_\(starting_race\) "Elf (starting race)") while providing 200 less nutrition to [orcs](/wiki/Orc_\(starting_race\) "Orc (starting race)"). At a nutrition/weight ratio of 120 for orcs, they remain the most efficient food available.
- Cram rations provide 100 extra nutrition for [dwarves](/wiki/Dwarf_\(starting_race\) "Dwarf (starting race)").

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.1. Click here for more information.](/images/d/d3/Nh361-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.1. Click here for more information.")

**This page may need to be updated for the [current version](/wiki/Current_version "Current version") of *NetHack*.**

It may contain text specific to [NetHack 3.6.1](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.1 "NetHack 3.6.1"). Information on this page may be out of date.

**Editors:** After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-361}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.
html:
Nutrition/Weight

From NetHackWiki
< Nutrition
Jump to navigation Jump to search

Here is a list of food organized by its nutrition/weight ratio. The idea is that, all other considerations being equal (such as other uses for food besides nutrition, etc.), it makes most sense to eat foods with a lower ratio first and hang on to food that gives a higher ratio to maximize weight efficiency.

V indicates vegetarian food
! indicates vegan food

Food Cost Weight Probability Nutrition Nutrition/weight Turns to eat Conduct
lembas wafer 45 5 20 800 160 2 !
lump of royal jelly 15 2 0 200 100 1 V
pancake 15 2 25 200 100 2 V
egg 9 1 85 80 80 1 V
blessed tin of spinach 5 10 0.625 600 60 1-2 !
slime mold (user defined fruit) 17 5 75 250 50 1 !
candy bar 10 2 13 100 50 1 V
uncursed tin of spinach 5 10 11.25 401-600 40.1-60 varies !
food ration (gunyoki) 45 20 380 800 40 5 !
cram ration 35 15 20 600 40 3 !
K-ration 25 10 0 400 40 1 !
banana 9 2 10 80 40 1 !
orange 9 2 10 80 40 1 !
clove of garlic 7 1 7 40 40 1 !
sprig of wolfsbane 7 1 7 40 40 1 !
fortune cookie 7 1 55 40 40 1 V, breaks illiteracy unless blind
kelp frond 6 1 0 30 30 1 !
eucalyptus leaf 6 1 3 30 30 1 !
C-ration 20 10 0 300 30 1 !
apple 7 2 15 50 25 1 !
carrot 7 2 15 50 25 1 !
pear 7 2 10 50 25 1 !
tripe ration 15 10 140 200 20 2
melon 10 5 10 100 20 1 !
cursed tin of spinach 5 10 0.625 201-600 20.1-60 varies !
cream pie 10 10 25 100 10 1 V
lichen corpse 5 20 n/a 200 10 3 !
meatball 5 1 0 5 5 1
meat ring 5 1 0 5 5 1
meat stick 5 1 0 5 5 1
huge chunk of meat 105 400 0 2000 5 20
lizard corpse 5 10 n/a 40 4 3
other corpses 5 varies 0 varies varies varies
tin 5 10 75 varies varies varies

Racial bonuses and penalties

As of NetHack 3.6.1, the following bonuses and penalties exist:

  • Lembas wafers provide 200 extra nutrition to elves while providing 200 less nutrition to orcs. At a nutrition/weight ratio of 120 for orcs, they remain the most efficient food available.
  • Cram rations provide 100 extra nutrition for dwarves.

This page may need to be updated for the current version of NetHack.

It may contain text specific to NetHack 3.6.1. Information on this page may be out of date.

Editors: After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-361}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.

The idea is that, all other considerations being equal (such as other uses for food besides nutrition, etc.), it makes most sense to eat foods with a lower ratio first and hang on to food that gives a higher ratio to maximize weight efficiency.
